Uses of Package
nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification

  • Packages that use nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification 
    Package Description
    nz.ac.auckland.morc  
    nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification  
  • Classes in nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification used by nz.ac.auckland.morc 
    Class and Description
    AsyncOrchestratedTestBuilder
    A builder that generates a complete test specification including all expectations for asynchronously sending a message to a target destination.
    OrchestratedTestSpecification
    An orchestrated test is a declarative way of specifying a target for a message with a number of expectations related to call-outs required for the process that the original message triggered is deemed to be correct.
    SyncOrchestratedTestBuilder
    A builder that generates a synchronous orchestrated test specification that will call a target endpoint that provides a response(s).
  • Classes in nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification used by nz.ac.auckland.morc.specification 
    Class and Description
    AsyncOrchestratedTestBuilder
    A builder that generates a complete test specification including all expectations for asynchronously sending a message to a target destination.
    OrchestratedTestSpecification
    An orchestrated test is a declarative way of specifying a target for a message with a number of expectations related to call-outs required for the process that the original message triggered is deemed to be correct.
    OrchestratedTestSpecification.EndpointNode
    A convenience class that allows us to specify ordering between the expectations
    OrchestratedTestSpecification.OrchestratedTestSpecificationBuilderInit 
    SyncOrchestratedTestBuilder
    A builder that generates a synchronous orchestrated test specification that will call a target endpoint that provides a response(s).
